effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Void Bolt at an enemy at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dark Ascension or Void Eruption always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! grants you 5.0 seconds of Power Infusion. Mind Blast and Void Bolt deal 10% increased damage while Power Infusion is active.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gloves of the Woodland Raccoon

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,957 to 9,725 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 295 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 373 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 93,491 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 140,244.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cloak of the Woodland Raccoon

spells.description:
Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
